description: NOXUBEE- Stella Mae Roby, 62, died June 1, 2020, at NMMC of West Point. Mrs. Roby was born May 15, 1958, in Noxubee County, to the late Peter Wells Jr. and Mary H. Wells. She is survived by her children, Eddie Earl Roby, Patrick of Roby both of Brooksville, Lonnie Roby Anthony Roby, Recous Roby and McKenzie Roby all of Columbus; siblings, Mary Ervin, Brenda Johnson, Peter Wells III,...
text:
NOXUBEE \- Stella Mae Roby, 62, died June 1, 2020, at NMMC of West Point. A
family only private graveside service will be at 2 p.m. Saturday, at Second
James Creek Cemetery, with Michael Tate officiating. Carter's Funeral Services
of Macon is in charge of arrangements. Mrs. Roby was born May 15, 1958, in
Noxubee County, to the late Peter Wells Jr. and Mary H. Wells. She was a
member of Second James Creek MBC. She is survived by her children, Eddie Earl
Roby, Patrick of Roby both of Brooksville, Lonnie Roby Anthony Roby, Recous
Roby and McKenzie Roby all of Columbus; siblings, Mary Ervin, Brenda Johnson,
Peter Wells III, Rebecca Booker, Ronald Wells all of Brooksville, Bertha
Jackson, Sharada Glaspie of Pontotoc, Willo Jackson of Louisville and Shoronda
Galspie; and 18 grandchildren.

Appeared in The Commercial Dispatch on June 5, 2020

relations.sentence: NOXUBEE \- Stella Mae Roby, 62, died June 1, 2020, at NMMC of West Point.

She is survived by her children, Eddie Earl Roby, Patrick of Roby both of Brooksville, Lonnie Roby Anthony Roby, Recous Roby and McKenzie Roby all of Columbus; siblings, Mary Ervin, Brenda Johnson, Peter Wells III, Rebecca Booker, Ronald Wells all of Brooksville, Bertha Jackson, Sharada Glaspie of Pontotoc, Willo Jackson of Louisville and Shoronda Galspie; and 18 grandchildren.

She is survived by her children, Eddie Earl Roby, Patrick of Roby both of Brooksville, Lonnie Roby Anthony Roby, Recous Roby and McKenzie Roby all of Columbus; siblings, Mary Ervin, Brenda Johnson, Peter Wells III, Rebecca Booker, Ronald Wells all of Brooksville, Bertha Jackson, Sharada Glaspie of Pontotoc, Willo Jackson of Louisville and Shoronda Galspie; and 18 grandchildren.

title: Stella Roby
html:
NOXUBEE - Stella Mae Roby, 62, died June 1, 2020, at NMMC of West Point. A family only private graveside service will be at 2 p.m. Saturday, at Second James Creek Cemetery, with Michael Tate officiating. Carter's Funeral Services of Macon is in charge of arrangements. Mrs. Roby was born May 15, 1958, in Noxubee County, to the late Peter Wells Jr. and Mary H. Wells. She was a member of Second James Creek MBC. She is survived by her children, Eddie Earl Roby, Patrick of Roby both of Brooksville, Lonnie Roby Anthony Roby, Recous Roby and McKenzie Roby all of Columbus; siblings, Mary Ervin, Brenda Johnson, Peter Wells III, Rebecca Booker, Ronald Wells all of Brooksville, Bertha Jackson, Sharada Glaspie of Pontotoc, Willo Jackson of Louisville and Shoronda Galspie; and 18 grandchildren.

Appeared in The Commercial Dispatch on June 5, 2020
